name: CentralMallLawton
0:
”Alexa, ask Central Mall Lawton if there are any jobs available”
”Alexa, ask Central Mall Lawton what restaurants they have”
”Alexa, ask Central Mall Lawton what are their upcoming events”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: central mall lawton
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Central Mall Lawton’s skill will let you know all the important information and happenings at the center. Whether you’re curious what type of stores they have, where to get a rideshare, when they will be closing, or what the next upcoming event is, download this skill to be informed on all things at Central Mall Lawton. You can access this skill on any of your Alexa devices.

To get started, enable Central Mall Lawton’s skill through by saying, “Alexa, open Central Mall Lawton.”

If you’re having trouble, please visit www.centralmalllawton.com.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
